DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy VX-661 combination ivacaftor ivacaftor monotherapy subject Cystic Fibrosis ( CF ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 3 Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Ivacaftor VX-661 Combination With Ivacaftor Subjects Aged 12 Years Older With Cystic Fibrosis , Heterozygous F508del-CFTR Mutation
